instructions:
In a frying pan make a roux with the butter and flour. Stir in tomato paste, A-1 and Worcestershire sauce.
Add beef stock and cook to reduce to about 1 cup. Set aside.

STEAK PREPARATION
1/2 tbsp butter
4 tenderloin fillets *(or hamburger patties)*
6 green onions, chopped
1 cup sliced mushrooms

Fry steaks in melted butter on one side, turn and add onions and mushrooms and continue frying steaks to
desired doneness. Spoon Brown Sauce over steaks and heat till warm throughout and serve.
